messages.content: write a netlogo program to simulate boids. add a predator that the boids will turn 180 degrees from if within distance of 20% of screen height.

Here is a NetLogo program to simulate boids with a predator that will turn 180 degrees from if within a distance of 20% of the screen height:
to setup
set-default-shape turtlesquare
size 100

ask turtles [
  set color black
  set shape boid
  set heading 0
  set speed 0.5
  set max-velocity 3
  set tuned-radius 0.3
  set predator-distance 20

  ;; Start boid at a random location
  set x (random 95)
  set y (random 95)

  ;; Create a 'predator'
  create-predator
  ask predator [
    set color red
    set shape predator
    set heading 360
    set speed 3
    set max-velocity 10
    move-to x y
  ]

  ;; Movement rules for boids
  move-boid
  update-heading
  check-for-predator
  check-for-wall
]

to create-predator
  create-agent 1 [
    set shape predator
    set color red
    set size 2
  ]
end

to check-for-predator
  if (distance-from? self predator) < predator-distance
    ask predator [
      move-to x y
    ]
  end
end

to check-for-wall
  if (distance-from? self wall) < 20
    heading-to 0
  end
end
